data.question: What is the empirical formula of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
What is the space group of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
What is the temperature used for the X-ray diffraction studies of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
Does the Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2 exhibit breathing behavior?
What is the calculated bandgap of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2?
Is the conductivity of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2 higher than Mn2(DSBDC)(DMF)2?
What method was used for the electronic and structural calculations?
What is the effect of substituting Mn2+ with Fe2+ in MOFs on electrical conductivity?
data.answer: Substituting Mn2+ with Fe2+ leads to a million-fold enhancement in electrical conductivity.

data.question: What is the significance of the Mössbauer spectroscopy measurements for Fe-based MOFs?
data.answer: To confirm the oxidation state and high-spin configuration of the Fe atoms.

data.question: Is the conductivity of Fe2(DOBDC)(DMF)2 higher than Mn2(DOBDC)(DMF)2?
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent and is also coordinated to the metal sites.

data.question: What is the absorption coefficient of Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
Does the phase change in Fe2(DSBDC) involve bond destruction and reconstruction?
What computational tool was used for the PXRD pattern simulation of Fe2(DSBDC)?
What is the effect of hexagon distortion in the crystal lattice of Fe2(DSBDC)?
data.answer: It breaks the 3-fold symmetry and reduces the hexagon area to accommodate the loss of non-coordinating solvent.

data.question: Is the conductivity of Fe frameworks described in the text the highest in the MOF-74 family?
What is the calculated work function of Fe2(DSBDC)?
Does the presence of loosely bound Fe2+ β-spin electrons contribute to the higher conductivity of Fe2(DSBDC)?
What is the role of the hybrid exchange−correlation functional (HSE06) in the computational analysis?
data.answer: It is used for computing key electronic properties, including electron density, electrostatic potential, and band gap.

data.question: What is the significance of the variable-temperature PXRD patterns for Fe2(DSBDC)(DMF)2·x(DMF)?
data.answer: It indicates the reversible phase change associated with the removal and refilling of non-coordinating solvent in the pores.
